slide.title: The BNP-led opposition activists set fire to a bus in the capital's Mirpur. Photo: Focus Bangla, Banglar Chokh
The BNP-led opposition activists set fire another bus at Abdullapur. Photo: Photo: Focus Bangla, Banglar Chokh
The BNP-led opposition activists set fire to a pick-up at Bijoy Nagar. Photo: Focus Bangla, Banglar Chokh

A bus in front of Shilpa Bhaban in Motijheel yesterday, the second day of the sixth phase of the opposition's countrywide blockade, demanding cancellation of the January 5 general elections and restoration of the caretaker government system. Photo: Focus Bangla, Banglar Chokh
